name: fizzbuzz
description: Fizz buzz (often spelled FizzBuzz in this context) has been used as an interview screening device for computer programmers. Writing a program to output the first 100 FizzBuzz numbers is a trivial problem for any would-be computer programmer, so interviewers can easily filter out those with insufficient programming ability.
author: Alexandre Leroux <alex@sherpa.one> (https://sherpa.one/)
